sentences.en: Criticizing will only destroy a relationship and create feelings of failure.
sentences.cn: 批评责备只能破坏关系，让人产生失败感。

sentences.en: He approached me to create and design the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他请我建造并设计该饭店。

sentences.en: Her behaviour is creating a lot of problems.
sentences.cn: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.en: In the dining-room the draperies create an atmosphere of elegance.
sentences.cn: 在餐厅里，打褶装饰物能营造雅致的氛围。

sentences.en: Making lists can create order and control.
sentences.cn: 列表能使一切井然有序、便于管理。

sentences.en: Mellow music and lighting helped to create the right atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 柔和的音乐和灯光衬托出了适宜的氛围。

sentences.en: Singing can create a sense of wellbeing.
sentences.cn: 唱歌能够给人一种心旷神怡的感觉。

sentences.en: Sloping walls on the bulk of the building create an optical illusion.
sentences.cn: 大楼主体的斜墙给人造成一种视错觉。

sentences.en: Soft tones of blue and grey create a clean, bright look.
sentences.cn: 蓝色和灰色的柔和色调营造出明快、亮丽的视觉感观。

sentences.en: Some people believe the universe was created by a big explosion.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.en: That deal would create, in effect, the world's biggest airline.
sentences.cn: 这一协议将促成世界最大航空公司的成立。

sentences.en: The announcement only succeeded in creating confusion.
sentences.cn: 那通告反而引起了混乱。

sentences.en: The city will tear down the building and create a park.
sentences.cn: 该市将拆掉这幢大楼，在这儿建个公园。

sentences.en: The menu is all-important. Every component of every meal should create contrasts.
sentences.cn: 饭菜的安排至关重要。每一顿饭的每一道菜都应该有所不同。

sentences.en: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.cn: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

sentences.en: The superglue may not create a bond with some plastics.
sentences.cn: 强力胶水可能无法粘住某些塑料。

sentences.en: This dish was created by our chef Jean Richard.
sentences.cn: 这道菜是我们的厨师琼·理查德创制的。

sentences.en: We set business free to create more jobs in Britain.
sentences.cn: 我们放开对企业的限制以便在英国创造更多的就业机会。

sentences.en: We want to create jobs for the unem-ployed.
sentences.cn: 我们想为失业者创造就业岗位。

sentences.en: Wizards and templates can help you create brochures, calendars, and Web pages.
sentences.cn: 向导程序和模板可以帮助你创建手册、日历和网页。

words.tran_cn: 特别创造说；创造宇宙说

trans.tran_cn: 创造，创建，引起，产生，授予
trans.tran_en: to make something exist that did not exist before

trans.tran_cn: 创造， 创作， 创建； 引起， 产生
trans.tran_en: to make something exist that did not exist before
